scripts.generate: NODE_ENV=production pigment-store generate -s src -t tests -o styleguide
scripts.generate:dev: NODE_ENV=development pigment-store generate -s src -t tests -o styleguide --dev
scripts.snapshot: NODE_ENV=test pigment-store snapshot -s src -t tests -o styleguide
scripts.snapshot:dev: NODE_ENV=test pigment-store snapshot -s src -t tests -o styleguide -- --watch
